item.title: Using Artificial Intelligence to Augment Human Intelligence
item.description: By creating user interfaces which let us work with the representations inside machine learning models, we can give people new tools for reasoning.

item.title: Sequence Modeling with CTC
item.description: A visual guide to Connectionist Temporal Classification, an algorithm used to train deep neural networks in speech recognition, handwriting recognition and other sequence problems.

item.title: Feature Visualization
item.description: How neural networks build up their understanding of images.

item.title: Why Momentum Really Works
item.description: We often think of optimization with momentum as a ball rolling down a hill. This isn't wrong, but there is much more to the story.

item.title: Research Debt
item.description: Science is a human activity. When we fail to distill and explain research, we accumulate a kind of debt...

item.title: Experiments in Handwriting with a Neural Network
item.description: Several interactive visualizations of a generative model of handwriting. Some are fun, some are serious.

item.title: Deconvolution and Checkerboard Artifacts
item.description: When we look very closely at images generated by neural networks, we often see a strange checkerboard pattern of artifacts.

item.title: How to Use t-SNE Effectively
item.description: Although extremely useful for visualizing high-dimensional data, t-SNE plots can sometimes be mysterious or misleading.

item.title: Attention and Augmented Recurrent Neural Networks
item.description: A visual overview of neural attention, and the powerful extensions of neural networks being built on top of it.
